price: 46 qui ont l’intime conviction qu’ils retourneront un jour à leur Seigneur et qu’ils Le rencontreront.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaẓunnūna annahum mulāqū rabbihim wa-annahum ilayhi rājiʿūna
